name: Cricket Through the Ages
description:
Everybody has hit someone with a bat or a ball at least once.
Experience the action-packed evolution of the world's greatest sport through multiple eras of history, from its humble prehistoric beginnings to taking its rightful place among the stars.
Cricket Through the Ages is the factual, physics-based chronicle of humanity's passion for the spirit of cricket. Whether solo or with an able partner, batter up for a cricket-based game that's anything but cricket.
Key Features:
Master the ancient art of cricket through the miracle of a simple, one button control scheme.
Play through nine unique, historically accurate game modes solo or against a friendly rival.
Physics-based buffoonery from the creators of Broforce and Genital Jousting.
